Kin Lane

  • Fri, Nov 12, 2021 - @gertjanwilde @nickleplated @getpostman The team dove in. No elevated 504s recently. Depends on how you are using and which APIs there could be other external or internal issues. More details would help identify isolate to the application or API.

  • Tue, Nov 09, 2021 - Doing Breaking Changes has pushed me over the line with watching my own videos. I used to hate watching, then I just cringe watched, then I was bored & now I am picking it apart and actually trying to change my behavior. Kept notes of my QCon talk just now on where I can improve.
